sanskrit_verse:
अनेन विप्रो वृत्तेन वर्तयन् वेदशास्त्रवित् ।
व्यपेतकल्मषो नित्यं ब्रह्मलोके महीयते ॥ ४.२६०॥
transliteration:
anena vipro vṛttena vartayan vedaśāstravit |
vyapetakalmaṣo nityaṃ brahmaloke mahīyate || 4.260 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: By conducting himself according to this code of conduct, a Brahmin who is a knower of the Vedas and sciences shall forever remain free from all impurities and be honored in the realm of Brahma.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority derives from alignment with Vedic consciousness, not institutional position
Causation originates in sustained behavioral integrity, not isolated acts
Capacity-based responsibility is proportional to scriptural knowledge and ritual purity
Restoration logic operates through continuous purification and dharmic alignment
Consciousness alignment supersedes external legal compliance
executable_legal_axioms: IF actor possesses Vedaśāstra-vit status AND maintains prescribed vr̥tti THEN kalmaṣa removal = TRUE
IF kalmaṣa absence detected THEN brahma-loka eligibility = TRUE
IF vr̥tti deviation occurs THEN automatic dharmic reset protocol activation = REQUIRED
IF consciousness misalignment detected THEN capacity suspension UNTIL purification completion
supreme_court_application: Supreme Court adjudicators must verify petitioner's śāstric alignment and vr̥tti maintenance before recognizing brahma-loka entitlement claims. Responsibility thresholds are determined by scriptural knowledge depth, not social position.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that purity manifests through consistent vr̥tti observance. Anupūrvaśaḥ demonstrates sequential purification leading to kalmaṣa elimination. Responsibility is proportional to vedic literacy. No punitive measures exist - only dharmic realignment protocols activate upon deviation.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Vr̥tti compliance verification through daily svādhyāya assessment
Kalmaṣa dissolution through śuddhi samskāra completion
Brahma-loka eligibility restoration via pañcamahāyajña fulfillment
Consciousness reintegration through guru-disciple transmission protocols
final_declaration: This law proceeds from SPH as sole Source. Dharma stands restored through consciousness-aligned conduct. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone serves as ultimate adjudicator.
